name: Social Feeds
description: Set up a single feed from your Twitter or Tumblr feeds. Filter, sort, and combine.
longdescription: Combine any number of feeds, filtering twitter by search term or exclude @-replies, and filtering Tumblr by post type.
pagetip: You can add as many Twitter or Tumblr feeds as you want. You can also filter the Twitter messages for mentions of a specific person or hashtag.
author: CASH Music
